stepAnswer: You must implement data quality rules and remediate issues which occur due to an error in your report
stepTitle: You are writing a report for the marketing team that includes several calculated fields that you have created. What is your responsibility for the calculated fields which only appear on the report you have produced?
choices: You must implement data quality rules and remediate issues which occur due to an error in your report
You must remediate all data quality issues which occur in the source prior to the data being on your report
You are only concerned with the quality of data in the calculated fields you produced
